desc: New carbon fiber car parts designed by Faircloth Composites will give you the competitive edge you need to handle every corner, no matter what track you’re on.

layout.text: Carbon fiber splitters, wings and other aerodynamic parts for your race car

Faircloth Composites is a small USA based business that specializes in custom aerodynamic, carbon fiber car parts for your racecar. 

- Wind tunnel tested wings with real data
- 3D Splitters with integrated diffusers
- Hoods
- Fender vents
- Fenders
- Rear diffusers
Everything you need to make your car handle the way it should.
Designed for car people, by car people.
All our parts are made one at a time by hand here in Connecticut. Please contact us for current lead times.
